channel.title: Gahh I can't take this anymore, I'm sorry :(
channel.description:
Guys I know this is in the wrong section and I'm sorry for that, I just cannot find out how to fix my problem with my webclient, everytime I try to run the jar file it says error connecting... please report, whenever I try to run the run.bat I generated from jarmaker this is the error,
C:\Users\Buffenbarger\Downloads\HaizScape source>java -jar client.jar java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\ErasedPkzcache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:81) at client.startUp(client.java:8866) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6074) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53) at Update.(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4778) at client.startUp(client.java:8876) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6074) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
And notice how it says it cannot find the ErazedPkz cache? That's not even the cache I'm using. Can somebody please help.

item.title: Gahh I can't take this anymore, I'm sorry :(
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

So like make a new cache download link, and change it in the cachedownloader?

Read full topic

item.title: Gahh I can't take this anymore, I'm sorry :(
item.dc:creator: @Gizcat Gizcat
item.description:
@Gizcat wrote:

You need to change your cache directories on the client.

Read full topic

@b00mz1029 wrote:

Guys I know this is in the wrong section and I’m sorry for that, I just cannot find out how to fix my problem with my webclient, everytime I try to run the jar file it says error connecting… please report, whenever I try to run the run.bat I generated from jarmaker this is the error,

C:\Users\Buffenbarger\Downloads\HaizScape source>java -jar client.jar java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\ErasedPkzcache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:81) at client.startUp(client.java:8866) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6074) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53) at Update.(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4778) at client.startUp(client.java:8876) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6074) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
